alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 3:32AM MST until November 29 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up 3 to 5 inches for the lower elevations with 6 to 12 inches in the northern Laramie Range. * WHERE...Converse and Niobrara counties in east central Wyoming, including the cities of Douglas and Lusk. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and very low visibilities in falling snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County
